item.title: DUSK now available for Xbox Series
item.content:encoded:
• Xbox Series

PC version also available via Microsoft Store.

Retro first-person shooter DUSK is now available for Xbox Series for $19.99, publisher New Blood Interactive announced. The PC version is also now available via Microsoft Store.

DUSK first launched for PC via Steam, GOG, and Humble Store on December 10, 2018 following an Early Access period that began on January 10, 2018. A Switch version was released on October 28, 2021, followed by PlayStation 4 on October 31, 2023.

Here is an overview of the game, via New Blood Interactive:

Battle through an onslaught of mystical backwater cultists, possessed militants & even darker forces as you attempt to discover just what lurks beneath the Earth in this retro first-person shooter.

Three distinct campaign episodes await you, hand-crafted from straight outta the â€™90s! Featuring a vast arsenal of killer weaponry including sickles, swords, crossbows, rifles, dual-wielded and double barreled shotguns and incredibly necessary grenade and rocket launchers. DUSK brings unapologetic retro action from start to finish.

In addition to the main campaign, DUSK also features an Endless Survival Mode, putting you front and center against wave after wave of merciless enemies.

Watch a ne wtrailer below.

Xbox Series Launch Trailer
